name: Abduct Fish
description:
This game was made using This Converted to HTML using This And i really dont want you to click This

Also, i recommend you to download the HTML file as it works the same as the exe version but it takes up less storage. Also, I havnt tested the Linux and Mac version

For MacOS version, the converter told me to instruct the users to do this 'ignore scary Gatekeeper warnings by opening Finder > Navigating to the application > Right click > Open > Open'

I dont know what is this as i dont own a Mac, but i hope you can work it out... i guess.

Anyways, i recommend you to use the HTML file
